chapters.title: Chapter 34: The Last Village
chapters.info: Tigraine Damodred, p. 441—Daughter-Heir of Andor before Morgase became queen, sister of Luc Mantear. She disappeared before her mother died, and when she did there was no daughter-heir to take the throne, and the Succession began. There are some who believe she is still alive. See also Damodred, Galadedrid; Damodred, Taringail; Mantear, Luc.
